William, the Survivalist SRE
0 Survivor Survivor
1 Stamina Regen = 5 Max Stamina = 13 Hunger 2 (At the beginning of your end phase, put hunger counters on this permanent equal to the amount of its hunger not satiated this turn. Then if this permanent has three or more hunger counters, remove an endurance counter from it.)
Jimmy, the Comfort Eater SRE
0 Survivor Survivor
1 Stamina Regen = 4 Max Stamina = 9 Hunger 4 (At the beginning of your end phase, put hunger counters on this permanent equal to the amount of its hunger not satiated this turn. Then if this permanent has three or more hunger counters, remove an endurance counter from it.) Whenever Jimmy, the Comfort Eater is fed, remove a hunger counter from him and put an endurance counter on him.
